name: What The Hell!
description:
The BloodyStars will have to work together to defend their lands with the sweat and blood of old acquaintances ...

An original and frenetic arcade, with direct gameplay that hooks you from the first moment.

Hell can be an inhospitable and dangerous place, but it's also fun!

  Keyboard control:

   Up / down lane selection.

   Left / right monster selection.

   X- Create the selected monster.

   Z- Returns the selected monsters.

   Esc- Exit game

It is a game for Windows created by Articplanet.
